Sternberg paradigm.EditorialNote: Brain Map uses this designtation only when letters are used as stimuli;  however there is some confusion about whether other stimuli may be used in the Sternberg paradigm
Sternberg paradigm.Definition: A delayed matching-to-sample paradigm that uses letters or numbers as stimuli (Sternberg S.  High-speed scanning in human memory. Science. 1966 Aug 5;153(736):652-4).
